annotations.description:
Build and run Perl applications on RHEL 7. For more information about using this builder image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/s2i-perl-container/blob/master/5.26/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of Perl available on OpenShift, including major versions updates.

Build and run Perl 5.26 applications on RHEL 7. For more information about using this builder image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/s2i-perl-container/blob/master/5.26/README.md.
